title: S3 Ep5: Central banks and regional inequality
itunes:title: Central banks and regional inequality
description: Is regional inequality a problem that central banks should worry about? Andy Haldane of the Bank of England tells Tim Phillips why he thanks the answer is yes: but why we also need to think about what, and how, we measure.
itunes:author: VoxTalks
